CmdLine: apt-get update &&     DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y         gcc-7         g++-7         wget     && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

CmdLine: cd /tmp/ &&     wget https://dl.bintray.com/boostorg/release/1.70.0/source/boost_1_70_0.tar.gz -O -         | tar -xz &&     cd /tmp/boost_1_70_0 &&     ./bootstrap.sh --prefix=/opt/boost-1.70.0 &&     ./b2 &&     ./b2 install &&     cd / &&     rm -rf /tmp/boost_1_70_0
